title: Max
text: Co-founder of Plethora. Building web3 products and web3 communities, night and day. Advisor and seed investor in ICP ecosystem.

title: Tommy
text: Co-founder of Plethora. Former AAA game developer building player-first games.

title: Hitesh
text: Experienced Blockchain developer, contributed to several IC ecosystem projects as full-stack developer. Currently contributing to BOOM DAO, enhancing web3 gaming development on ICP.

title: Jack
text: Experienced Game Designer who discovered a passion for blockchain technology and loves contributing to Web3 projects. Embracing Web3 gaming innovation on ICP, one block at a time.

title: Misha
text: CG artist with 13 years of experience. Worked on many large projects, including top world studios as render artist, VFX artist, script writer and AR/VR developer. Currently working as creative lead for BOOM DAO.

title: Ethan - Gekctek
text: Creator and main developer of ICP.NET. Motoko developer working on open source and experimenting on the Internet Computer.

title: Joey
text: Cubetopia founder. Game/Blockchain developer.

title: Cubetopia
text: Minecraft meets World of Warcraft, on the blockchain. Build, chat and adventure with friends, right in your browser.

title: Plethora
text: A web3 gaming lab building casual games and gaming infrastructure tools on the Internet Computer blockchain.

title: Ricardo
text: Elementum founder, building Bounty Rush and a Trading Card Game. Co-host of the 1st ICP Community Conference. ICP ES founder. Motoko dev.

title: Elementum
text: Elementum is dedicated to developing card games. Combining the best aspects of web3 and the traditional gaming world by focusing on UX and leveraging IC technology.

title: George
text: Founder of UnfoldVR. 2X startup founder executing on VR and Blockchain technology. Bullish on the New Immersive Creator Economy.

title: UnfoldVR
text: The Decentralized infrastructure for the new Immersive Creator Economy. A Digital Makers Space! Create And Discover interactive content!

title: Obsidian Tears
text: Obsidian Tears is a 2D RPG similar to the old time classics. Come build your hero with NFT items, spells, and more in a land of original art, music, and adventure.

title: Inside Dark Studio
text: A dedicated game development studio, focused on creating immersive and captivating gaming experiences that transport players to new realms of imagination

title: Eimolad
text: A fantasy world inhabited by humans, dwarves, orcs, elves and other fantastic creatures. This is a world of magic and valor. This world is full of mysteries, dangers and incredible adventures.

title: Paws Arena
text: The cutest, most fun and competitive turn-based multiplayer game on the Internet Computer.

title: Puppies: Realms of Darkness
text: A roguelike game where your ICPuppies NFT battles against ever growing waves of monsters.

title: Cosmicrafts
text: A real-time strategy web3 game to experience action packed and fast-paced intergalactic warfare by commanding your own space fleet.

title: Cthulhu
text: Cthulhu Awakens combines elements of Match-3, RPGs, base building, and interactive novels to deliver a truly unparalled experience.

title: Dfinity Space Academy
text: Embark on an epic adventure across the vast expanse of the universe, encountering other races and civilizations along the way.

title: Boxy World
text: Boxy World is a cutting-edge blockchain game that combines NFT-based breeding and staking mechanics, offering players a unique and immersive gaming experience.
